about.name: Who am I?
about.description: I am Mat√©o, I am {age} years old, and I have been a self-taught web developer since 2012. Creator of large projects, both personal and professional. Every project I work on is an extension of my curiosity, pushing me to solve problems in innovative ways. Beyond web development, I am passionate about IT. Installing and configuring computers is part of my daily tasks.

about.name: My Education
about.description: After middle school, I chose the vocational track for studies as a Surveyor Technician, as IT and development were just hobbies. I obtained the BEP as well as the Bac Pro. I then continued my studies in the field of Public Works and obtained the BTS in 2022.

about.name: After Education
about.description: From July 2022, I started working on many large web projects. I also worked in the Public Works sector until June 2023. Finally, from October 2023, I started working in IT at a high school, managing the entire IT infrastructure.

about.name: The Future
about.description: It is hard to predict the future, but my dream would be to work in one of my fields (Web, IT, or Public Works) in the United States or Canada.

diplomes.name: MIDDLE SCHOOL DIPLOMA
diplomes.about: Obtained the Middle School Diploma in July 2017.

diplomes.name: Professional Baccalaureate - T.G.T.
diplomes.about: Obtained the Professional Baccalaureate as Surveyor Technician in July 2020. BEP in 2019.

diplomes.name: Higher Technician Certificate - Public Works
diplomes.about: Obtained the Higher Technician Certificate in Public Works in July 2022.

other.name: Volunteer at Secours Populaire in Carvin
